comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Location of 1914 international peace conference in relation to U.S. intervention in Mexico. Another photo of the hotel, with more information about the conference and the building, is: See www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/tags/niagarafal... for more photos.

comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: The earlier Village of Clifton and thus the present Clifton Hill in Niagara Falls (and thus the Hotel) named ultimately for the town of Clifton in England.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks swanq and jamica1 for the information about this image.  We will add more details to the description when we update.
